TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit EntryPointNotFoundException extends System.TypeLoadException

summary.span: 因不存在项方法而导致加载类的尝试失败时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to load a class fails due to the absence of an entry method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当公共语言运行时无法加载程序集，因为不能确定程序集的入口点时引发异常。An exception is thrown when the common language runtime is unable to load an assembly because it cannot identify the assembly's entry point. 可以在以下情况下会引发此异常：This exception can be thrown under the following conditions: - 公共语言运行时找不到应用程序入口点 (通常`Main`方法) 中可执行程序集。The common language runtime is unable to locate an application entry point (typically a `Main` method) in an executable assembly. 应用程序入口点必须是全局或`static`具有无参数或一个字符串数组作为其唯一的参数的方法。The application entry point must be a global or `static` method that has either no parameters or a string array as its only parameter. 可以返回的入口点`void`，或者它可以返回或退出代码。The entry point can return `void`, or it can return an or exit code. 应用程序程序集不能定义多个入口点。An application assembly cannot define more than one entry point. - 无法解析对 Windows DLL 中函数的调用，因为找不到该函数。The call to a function in a Windows DLL cannot be resolved because the function cannot be found. 在以下示例中，因为 User32.dll 中不包含名为的函数引发异常`GetMyNumber`。In the following example, an exception is thrown because User32.dll does not include a function named `GetMyNumber`. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/nofunction1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/nofunction1.vb#1)] - 无法解析对 Windows DLL 中函数的调用，因为方法调用中使用的名称与程序集的名称不匹配。The call to a function in a Windows DLL cannot be resolved because the name used in the method call does not match a name found in the assembly. 通常情况下，这是因为字段隐式或显式设置为`true`、 调用的方法包含一个或多个字符串参数，包含 ANSI 和 Unicode 版本，并在方法调用中使用的名称不对应于此 ANSI 或 Unicode 版本的名称。Frequently, this occurs because the field is either implicitly or explicitly set to `true`, the called method includes one or more string parameters and has both an ANSI and a Unicode version, and the name used in the method call does not correspond to the name of this ANSI or Unicode version. 以下示例通过尝试调用 Windows 提供了说明`MessageBox`User32.dll 中的函数。The following example provides an illustration by attempting to call the Windows `MessageBox` function in User32.dll. 由于指定了第一个方法定义进行封送处理字符串，公共语言查找函数的宽字符版本`MessageBoxW`，而不是在方法调用中使用的名称`MessageBox`。Because the first method definition specifies for string marshaling, the common language looks for the wide-character version of the function, `MessageBoxW`, instead of the name used in the method call, `MessageBox`. 第二个方法定义可以解决此问题，通过调用`MessageBoxW`而不是`MessageBox`函数。The second method definition corrects this problem by calling the `MessageBoxW` instead of the `MessageBox` function. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/badcall1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/badcall1.vb#2)] - 想要通过其简单名称而不是其修饰的名调用动态链接库中的函数。You are trying to call a function in a dynamic link library by its simple name rather than its decorated name. 通常情况下，c + + 编译器将生成的 DLL 函数的修饰的名。Typically, the C++ compiler generates a decorated name for DLL functions. 例如，下面的 c + + 代码定义一个名为函数`Double`中一个名为 TestDll.dll 库。For example, the following C++ code defines a function named `Double` in a library named TestDll.dll. [!code-cpp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cpp/testdll.cpp#6)] 当尝试调用函数，在下面的示例代码会引发异常，因为`Double`找不到函数。When the code in the following example tries to call the function, an exception is thrown because the `Double` function cannot be found. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/mangle1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/mangle1.vb#7)] 但是，如果调用该函数是使用其修饰的名 (在这种情况下， `?Double@@YAHH@Z`)，函数调用成功，如以下示例所示。However, if the function is called by using its decorated name (in this case, `?Double@@YAHH@Z`), the function call succeeds, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/mangle2.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/mangle2.vb#8)] 您可以找到使用 Dumpbin.exe 之类的实用工具导出的 dll 函数的修饰的名。You can find the decorated names of functions exported by a DLL by using a utility such as Dumpbin.exe. - 您正在尝试在托管程序集中调用的方法，就像非托管动态链接库。You are attempting to call a method in a managed assembly as if it were an unmanaged dynamic link library. 若要了解此操作，请编译到程序集名为 StringUtilities.dll 下面的示例。To see this in action, compile the following example to an assembly named StringUtilities.dll. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/stringutilities.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/stringutilities.vb#3)] 然后，编译并执行下面的示例，它会尝试调用`StringUtilities.SayGoodMorning`StringUtilities.dll 动态链接库中的方法，就好像非托管的代码。Then compile and execute the following example, which attempts to call the `StringUtilities.SayGoodMorning` method in the StringUtilities.dll dynamic link library as if it were unmanaged code. 结果是异常。The result is an exception. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/importassembly1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/importassembly1.vb#4)] 若要消除此异常，添加到托管程序集并访问引用`StringUtilities.SayGoodMorning`方法就像你访问任何其他方法在托管代码中，如以下示例所示。To eliminate the exception, add a reference to the managed assembly and access the `StringUtilities.SayGoodMorning` method just as you would access any other method in managed code, as the following example does. [!code-csharp[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/cs/fiximportassembly1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.EntryPointNotFoundException.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.entrypointnotfoundexception.class/vb/fiximportassembly1.vb#5)] - 要调用 COM DLL 中的方法，就像 Windows DLL。You are trying to call a method in a COM DLL as if it were a Windows DLL. 若要访问 COM DLL，请选择**添加引用**Visual Studio 添加到项目中，引用，然后选择从类型库中的选项**COM**选项卡。To access a COM DLL, select the **Add Reference** option in Visual Studio to add a reference to the project, and then select the type library from the **COM** tab. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化为系统提供的描述错误，例如"未找到入口点。"的消息的新实例的属性This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Entry point was not found." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception inner) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, inner As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: inner

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 inner 参数不是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the inner parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回传递到构造函数中的相同值，或者如果 `Nothing` 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|
